Name: Heat Storm
Natural: The Heat Storm Tradesman 1500W Infrared Heater delivers silent, weatherproof infrared heat with a 7' cord and adjustable tripod, ideal for garages, workshops, and patios needing portable, fast, and wind-resistant heating.

Name: Dreo
Natural: The Dreo Portable Space Heater uses 1500W PTC ceramic heating to warm rooms in 3 seconds, with 65° oscillation, remote control, and ultra-quiet 40dB operation, perfect for efficient and peaceful home heating.

Name: Pelonis
Natural: The Pelonis 1500W Electric Oil Radiator Heater features adjustable thermostat, five heat settings, a 10-hour programmable timer, and a remote control, ideal for users seeking efficient, low-surface-temperature radiant heat.

Name: Honeywell
Natural: The Honeywell 360° Surround Heater offers all-around warmth, 360° tip-over safety, overheat protection, and dual heat settings, making it a reliable choice for small to mid-sized room heating with enhanced safety.

Name: Dr. Infrared Heater
Natural: The Dr. Infrared Heater DR-968 combines infrared quartz and PTC heating, delivering 60% more heat, ultra-quiet 39dB operation, and comprehensive safety features, ideal for large rooms needing powerful, safe warmth.

Name: De’Longhi
Natural: The De’Longhi TRRS0715E Radiant Heater features a digital LED panel, ECO function, 24-hour timer, and delivers 1500W of quiet, allergy-friendly heat with up to 35% more radiant surface, perfect for long-lasting comfort.

Name: Lasko
Natural: The Lasko Ceramic Tower Heater offers widespread oscillation, an elongated heating element, programmable thermostat, seven-hour timer, and remote control, ideal for safe, efficient heating of most home rooms.

Name: Dyson
Natural: The Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool Formaldehyde combines advanced HEPA H13 purification, catalytic destruction of formaldehyde, Air Multiplier™ technology, and smart app/voice control, perfect for whole-room air quality and heating.
